result.text: Entrepreneurs are holding face-to-face discussions at the Belt and Road CEO Conference that is being held in Beijing on Tuesday. The conference brings together more than 1,200 participants from over 80 countries and regions. Agreements on a number of practical cooperation projects, involving domestic as well as foreign partners, are expected to be signed during the conference. #PathstoSharedProsperity #TheNewSilkRoad
